### 1. Enable GitHub Pages (5 minutes)

Follow instructions in `docs/GITHUB-PAGES-SETUP.md`:

1. Go to https://github.com/intity01/grammar-extention/settings/pages
2. Under "Source", select:

4. Wait 1-2 minutes for deployment
5. Visit https://intity01.github.io/grammar-extention/
6. Verify privacy policy displays correctly

## ğŸ†˜ Troubleshooting

### GitHub Pages Not Working?

1. Check Settings â†’ Pages
2. Ensure source is "main" branch, "/docs" folder
3. Wait 5-10 minutes for first deployment
4. Check Actions tab for deployment status

### Privacy Policy Not Displaying?

1. Verify `docs/index.html` exists
2. Check file is committed and pushed
3. Clear browser cache
4. Try accessing with `/index.html` explicitly

### Need to Update Privacy Policy?

1. Edit `docs/index.html`
2. Commit: `git commit -am "Update privacy policy"`
3. Push: `git push`
4. Wait 1-2 minutes for rebuild
